Functions
00200_TEE_UnmaskCancellation
GP_050_Cancellation

Functions

 TestCase_GC00100_MonoSession_ReturnValueChanges ()
 
 TestCase_GC00101_TEECtoMonoSession_Invoke_ReturnValueChanges ()
 
 TestCase_GC00110_MultiSession_ReturnValueChanges ()
 
 TestCase_GC00120_MultiInstance_ReturnValueChanges ()
 
 TestCase_GC00121_MultiInstance_ReturnValueChangesParallel ()
 
 TestCase_GC00111_MultiSession_ReturnValueChangesParallel ()
 

Detailed Description

Description:
: Verify that TEE_UnmaskCancellation returns the correct value when called. 
           bool TEE_UnmaskCancellation(
                      void );

           CA setup:
              Same as TEE_GetCancellationFlag

           The TAs are the same as for TEE_GetCancellationFlag, but with additional commands:
              TEST_UNMASK_CANCELLATION: calls TEE_UnmaskCancellation() and sets the return value in the OUT parameter

           CA tear down:
              Same as TEE_GetCancellationFlag

Function Documentation

TestCase_GC00100_MonoSession_ReturnValueChanges ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that TEE_UnmaskCancellation() returns the correct return value.
Test Steps:
Open the TA with TEST_UNMASK_CANCELLATION Verify TEE_SUCCESS and that the OUT parameter contains TRUE (previously masked) Invoke the TA with TEST_UNMASK_CANCELLATION Verify TEE_SUCCESS and that the OUT parameter contains FALSE (previously masked)
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
Yes
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
Yes
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
Test ID:
GP_050_Cancellation.00200_TEE_UnmaskCancellation.GC00100_MonoSession_ReturnValueChanges

TestCase_GC00121_MultiInstance_ReturnValueChangesParallel ( )
Trusted Applications dependencies:
none
Focus:
Verify that TEE_UnmaskCancellation() returns the correct return value.
Test Steps:
Thread 1: DO Loop 20 times with rand delay of 2,4,6, or 8s: Open the TA with TEST_UNMASK_CANCELLATION Verify TEE_SUCCESS and that the OUT parameter contains TRUE (previously masked) Invoke the TA with TEST_UNMASK_CANCELLATION Verify TEE_SUCCESS and that the OUT parameter contains FALSE (previously masked) Thread 2: Open the TA with TEST_UNMASK_CANCELLATION Verify TEE_SUCCESS and that the OUT parameter contains TRUE (previously masked) DO Loop 20 times with rand delay of 1,3,5, or 7s: Invoke the TA with TEST_UNMASK_CANCELLATION Verify TEE_SUCCESS and that the OUT parameter contains FALSE (previously masked)
Manual Execution:
No
Trustonic Test Suite Testcase:
No
Final Device Testcase:
No
Extensive Testcase:
No
Basic Testcase:
No
Quick Testcase:
No
Minimum Product Version required for this testcase:
400A
